A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not going to try and embellish my review with much\, but this movie was AMAZING. The negativity seems to be coming largely from those who wanted it to be their idea of what Star Wars should be\, rather than a film in which they have no control or decision making power in. I grew up with Star Wars too\, and I thought this was a GREAT addition. Did things happen I didn't want? Sure. But that is part of movies in general. This was an interesting new and different take on the continuing story while remaining true to SW at its core. Loved it\, and will be seeing it again soon.
